backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining surgery case types, storage, and CRUD methods with authorization checks using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking MRN auto-fill functionality to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all major frontend source files, focusing on pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router, authentication gating, layout, and theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder component file for user profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating and editing cases with duplicate MRN detection, auto-fill, and full case field inputs.
frontend/src/components/cases/QuickAddDe: UI component that parses pasted or OCR-extracted demographic text and lets users edit and apply parsed fields.
frontend/src/components/cases/ToDoSectio: Manages case to‑do items including creation, toggling completion, and deletion using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with top navigation, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the sticky top navigation bar with app branding and login/identity info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend case and to‑do operations with React Query for listing, creating, updating, and deleting data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the app’s light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed case view with loading/error states and supports updating or deleting a case.
frontend/src/pages/CaseListPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, sortable case list with CSV/JSON import and export features.
frontend/src/pages/NewCasePage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new surgery case and navigates back after submission.
frontend/src/utils/caseMatching.ts: Finds the most recent case for an MRN by comparing arrival dates and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Utility functions for converting between bigint timestamps, Date objects, and YYYY-MM-DD strings.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsParser.ts: Parses free‑text demographics into structured fields with tracking for missing or uncertain values.
frontend/src/utils/ocrText.ts: Extracts text from images using the experimental TextDetector API and returns success or error info.
Parses CSV rows into SurgeryCase objects with validation for fields, enums, dates, booleans, and todos.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and requirements for MRN-based case lookup and auto-filled patient demographics.
